description:
Our client, an international company, a global group of energy and petrochemicals companies, is looking for “Health Manager”.


Requirements:

  • Higher education (Medical);
  • English level – fluent;
  • Experience in oil and gas is a plus;
  • 5 years broad experience in health area working for different jobs and locations ideally; 
  • Excellent communication skills;
  • A quick learner and team player.

Main responsibilities:

  • Deliver Company Health global services and manage accountabilities using standardized tools and processes;
  • Contract holder for local health service providers, including quality assurance of these services;
  • Deliver services and accountabilities aligned with the Ukraine Health and Safety Legislation;
  • Manage the Health skill pool and competences in conjunction with the Соmpany Health as appropriate;
  • Advise on clinical, occupational, community and environmental health issues associated with business activities and living environment, which may have a litigation, reputation or other business risk;
  • Be health focal point for various external stakeholders such as government, local communities, health and accident insurances, universities, industry associations, professional associations and others;
  • Assure implementation of Group health standards, procedures, and processes in company and other business units in Ukraine;
  • Assure compliance with relevant health legislation in the Ukraine ;
  • Ensure coordination with the HR, HSE, CX organization.

Company proposes:

  • Competitive salary level;
  • Official job placement;
  • Benefits.
name: Health Manager
